author: yiiyama
body:
DQM for the proposed Photon + VBF triggers [1].
Adding ability to cut on photon variables in ObjMonitor.cc and using that feature in two new modules defined in PhotonMonitor_cff.py.

[1] https://indico.cern.ch/event/658287/contributions/2693061/attachments/1508864/2352214/photonVBF.pdf
title: Topic photonvbf trigger
